title: Describe yourself with a champion quote

There are a bunch of lines that Yorick says that fit me:

{{champion:83}} "We shall prevail. We have eternity."
{{champion:83}} "Ah, would you like some friends? Nope, can’t have 'em." 
{{champion:83}} "I've endured more pain than any words can bring."
{{champion:83}} "I'm just happy to have company."
{{champion:83}} "I no longer feel insults."
